channel.title: CVE Feed for TipTopPress -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TipTopPress -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-49279|2024-10-17T19:32:14.748Z -- tiptoppress -- hyperlink%20group%20block
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in TipTopPress Hyperlink Group Block allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Hyperlink Group Block: from n/a through 1.17.5.
